data.event: After the French and Indian War, the Treaty of Paris of 1763 placed the area under British rule.

event.title: led to the passage of the Ordinance of 1787

data.event: Their proposals for the governance of the territory led to the passage of the Ordinance of 1787, which guided the establishment of states within the Northwestern Territory.

event.title: struggles with American Indians over the next decades

data.event: Bitter struggles with American Indians over the next decades would follow, culminating with the battle of Tippecanoe in 1811, which saw the final defeat of the American Indian tribes in Ohio led by Tecumseh.
